Package gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc

Class SatelliteSituationCenterRest.AsyncRequestExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc.SatelliteSituationCenterRest.AsyncRequestExecutor
  • Enclosing class:
    SatelliteSituationCenterRest
    private static class SatelliteSituationCenterRest.AsyncRequestExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a ThreadPoolExecutor with a fixed size thread pool and limited queue size.
    Since:
    2.3.1

        public boolean willAcceptNewTask​(java.lang.String client)
        Determines if this executor will accept a new task.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        whether this executor will accept a new task.

      • execute

        public void execute​(java.lang.Runnable task)
        Executes the given task at some time in the future. The task may execute in a new thread, in a pooled thread, or in the calling thread, at the discretion of the Executor implementation.
        Parameters:
        task - the runnable task.
